mapper.sql: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, query, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark from sys_menu
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu ( menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, query, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, create_user, create_time )values ( #{menuName}, #{parentId}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{query}, #{isFrame}, #{isCache}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{createUser}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: update sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName}, parent_id = #{parentId}, order_num = #{orderNum}, path=#{path}, component = #{component}, query = #{query}, is_frame = #{isFrame}, is_cache = #{isCache}, menu_type = #{menuType}, visible = #{visible}, status = #{status}, perms = #{perms}, icon = #{icon}, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = sysdate() where menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.is_delete = '0'

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and r.is_delete = '0' and m.is_delete = '0'

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.visible, ifnull(perms, '') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.is_delete = '0' and m.status = '0' and m.visible = '1' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.visible, ifnull(perms, '') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and r.is_delete = '0' and r.status = '0' and m.is_delete = '0' and m.status = '0' and m.visible = '1' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select count(1) from sys_menu where parent_id = #{parentId} and is_delete = '0'
